item.title: Favorite Johor Food Places
item.author: Author
item.description: This is a listing of my favorite food places in Johor. Japanese Ramen Kinnokura Izakaya Japanese Restaurant 金の藏居酒屋 Address: 85, Jalan Harimau Tarum, Taman Century, 80250 Johor Bahru, Johor Ramen Hitoyoshi Address: 51, Jalan Austin Heights 8/3, Taman Mount Austin, 81100 Johor Bahru, Johor Laksa Restoran Yew Swee 友水餐室 Address: 64, Jalan Harimau Tarum, Taman Century, 80300 Johor Bahru, Johor W.W. Laksa House 水塘。辣沙 Address: 36A1, Jalan Kolam Air, Taman Kolam Air, 80100 Johor Bahru, Johor
